txt.en: 'These weapons will do nicely. Put them in the barrel beside me.'
Erchar can be found at his encampment in the western end of Dor-en-Ernil, south-west of Tungobel.\n\nReturn the weapons to Erchar.
Erchar can be found at his encampment in the western end of Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nReturn the weapons to Erchar.
The weapons barrel can be found at Erchar's encampment in the western end of Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nPut the weapons in the barrel.
Talk to Erchar at his encampment

'The size of that creature.... How did it ambush us?!

'It is no man. This much is certain. Perhaps these half-trolls are an experiment of Sauron, and a gift to the Haradrim.

'Now we know that the enemy is searching for us. With these weapons, my men can defend themselves from any additional scouts sent our way.

'Let us turn our attention to Herion.'
Put the weapons in the barrel
A half-troll scout lunges from the brush
Put the weapons in the barrel
Erchar has asked you to retrieve weapons for his men so that they stand a fighting chance for the return to Linhir.

'During our escape to the wild, we made haste by dropping many of our heavier weapons. For this my men are without sufficient arms to defend themselves on the return to Linhir.\n\n'[placeholder], will you retrieve some Corsair weapons for my men so that they make it to Linhir with their lives?'
Talk to Erchar at his encampment
Corsair weapons can be found in the village of Tungobel.\n\nSteal weapons from Corsair forces.
